Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed was named Player of the Match for his performance of 3 wickets for 19 runs.
Najmul Hossain Shanto scored 71 runs off 55 balls.
Sean Williams scored 64 runs off 42 balls for Zimbabwe.
Mosaddek Hossain took 2 crucial wickets in the final over to secure the win for Bangladesh.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zimbabwe managed to score 147/8 in their 20 overs.
Bangladesh elected to bat first after winning the toss.
The match was held at Brisbane Cricket Ground, Woolloongabba, Brisbane.
